name: Tim Cook
description: Tim Cook is the CEO of Apple and serves on its board of directors. Before being named CEO in August 2011, Tim was Apple's chief operating officer, responsible for the company's global supply chain and operational excellence.

awards.name: TIME 100 Most Influential People
awards.description: Leadership in technology and social responsibility

vision: To create the best products on earth, and to leave the world better than we found it.
recentDevelopments: Launch of Vision Pro mixed reality headset
